text: Innum, "maryamutaiya makan isave, 'allahvaiyanri ennaiyum en tayaraiyum iru katavulkalaka akkikkollunkal' enru manitarkalitam nir kurinira?" Enru allah ketkum potu avar, "ni mikavum tuymaiyanavan; enakku urimaiyillata onrai nan colvatarkillai. Avvaru nan kuriyiruntal, ni atai niccayamaka arintiruppay. En manatilullatai ni arikiray, un ullattiliruppatai nan ariya matten;. Niccayamaka niye maraivanavarraiyellam nanku aripavan" enru avar kuruvar
